video_identification.title: Rabbis for Human Rights Fight for Fair Prices!

extracted_metadata.description: In the coming week, a harsh budget will pass, slashing workers’ salaries, increasing VAT, and pushing hundreds of thousands of families already struggling into even worse conditions. The high cost of food affects us all. We cannot allow such a cruel budget to pass – the government must take responsibility and support vulnerable populations. Click the link, send an email to all ministers with one click, and demand they stop the runaway prices, regulate the costs of healthy essential goods, and reduce VAT on them! https://drove.com/.2N24
